section.title: Overview
section.p: All pages are contained within com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebWindow objects. This could be a com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.TopLevelWindow representing an actual browser window, an com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.HtmlFrame representing a <frame> element or an com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.HtmlInlineFrame representing an <iframe> element.

When a com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient is first instantiated, a com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.TopLevelWindow is automatically created. You could think of this as being the first window displayed by a web browser. Calling com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient#getPage() will load the new page into this window.
